body:
So I basically unofficially "quit" Avicus a while ago due to the NCP and all round lagginess. While it hasn't improved greatly I can now call it mildly playable. I'm slowly coming back and it's late and I'm bored, so yah.

Bit about myself;
Mainly play OCN, participate in the tourneys over there. I do fairly okay, in every tourney I've played in my team has made the top 16, finishing 8th one tourney, and 5th in the other.
Known for being a pretty good bow player, and fairly good at shutting down frontlines when I tryhard and my ping isn't in the thousands (which it does on a regular basis).
Irish, in my Senior cycle of secondary school, studying Irish, English, Maths, Geography, Biology, German and Accounting.
During my time here;

I mainly played Nebula, shutting down frontlines and farming kills (had a pretty insane KD when I just used a bow all the time). Ended up getting bored and now I mainly no armour rush and see how many 1v1s I can win against armoured players before dying. I also do pretty okay for myself on Nexus.

Well that's it I guess, AMA.

title: Hi I'm back, AMA

replies.body: How did you feel about the tourney?
replies.body_tagged: How did you feel about the tourney?

replies.body:
GOTW? I slept through it (ty based family for removing alarm). 
A pretty big part of my teams strat was based around me being able to shut down frontlines for a bit, so they had to switch some roles around. They still almost won, so I think my team did pretty okay.

Probably smart to just make these all into one post.

@ivifetitaYT
Depends, opinions on puppies?
